title: Coordinator, Campaign Operations - Korea
overview: The Campaign Operations Coordinator will support the production of marketing assets across various platforms, ensuring campaigns are executed on-time and on-budget, and will collaborate with cross-functional teams to communicate campaign needs and timelines.
description:
The Role
We are looking for a Campaign Operations Coordinator to join our Marketing Production team. Marketing Production is the center of excellence for creative operations, cross-functional project management, and marketing asset production. Campaign Operations ensures all assets are planned, executed, and trafficked on-time and on-budget. We work closely with Creative Marketing, Strategy, Publicity, & Regional teams at Netflix to connect our stories with millions of people worldwide.Â 

To support our continued efforts, we are looking for an experienced coordinator to join this department, partnering with a team of project managers in all aspects of production. The ideal candidate for this role is enthusiastic, entrepreneurial, organized, and able to thrive in a fast-paced, ever-evolving environment. Youâ€™re a calm in the storm, and able to prioritize competing objectives across a range of global, regional, and local cross-functional partners. In short, you build bridges and connect dots...

The Campaign Operations Coordinator will partner closely with the Campaign Operations Managers, as well as producers in our AV, Print, and Regional production teams, to communicate campaign needs, timelines, and status across our Originals and Branded slate.Â Â

extras.title: Responsibilities include:
content: Support in coordinating all production across AV, print, and digital assets, including the input and maintenance of campaign status and data across our tooling set, ensuring internal sources of truth reflect current, accurate, and most up-to-date status for campaigns & assets
Manage operation-related cross-functional communications, ensuring effective exchange
of campaign milestones, assets and deliverables.
End-to-end campaign operational scope including: operational management of creatives, asset planning and production, and campaign fulfillment/delivery, as needed.
Work with various in-house creative and operational teams to source assets and initiate internal production work.
Liaise with cross-regional producers to ensure all deadlines and deliveries are on track
Serve as a go-to point of contact for our tooling and infrastructure teams
Collaborate with assigned Campaign Operations Managers to document campaign updates, pivots, and workback schedules, as needed
Provide back-up and coverage to assigned Campaign Operations Managers

extras.title: Qualifications:
content: 7+ years of experience supporting creative, project management, and/or creative production teams, preferably at an agency, entertainment studio or network. This is not an entry-level role.
Knowledge of and experience working on marketing and publicity campaigns, with a strong foundation in creative and production processes for video, print/OOH and digital materials.
A strong background working with internal and third-party tools, preferably tools designed for asset tracking, asset management, and project collaboration.
Well-versed in Video and Digital types and formats while understanding the fundamentals of asset management, servicing and trafficking.
Fluent in the language of marketing and/or tooling
Organized and concise with information and communication
Comfortable working with cross-functional teams and stakeholders across a wide variety of titles and content
